data.actual_result: It always uses the format MDY (e.g. for German `Juni 23. 2018`)
data.expected_result: It should use the correct date format for the respective language. E.g. for German `23. Juni 2018` (DMY).
data.short_description: Wrong date format used for some languages for "Request all of my Data" text
data.steps_to_repro: - Prerequisite: Make sure you have already requested a copy of all your data - Go to your User Settings by clicking on the cog - Change your language to any language with the date format DMY (for example German) - Open "Privacy & Safety" - Scroll down to "Request all of my Data" - Observe the date format there
